description: Checks whether a target clause exists in a document and returns evidence.

targetClause.description: The clause we are looking for (provided by the caller).

clausePresent.description: True if the document contains the clause or a clear paraphrase; otherwise false.

matchType.description: Return one of: Exact, Paraphrase, Missing.

evidenceQuote.description: A short quote from the document that supports the decision.
